sub_title: Principal Consultant at Slingshot Consulting, specialising in project controls, project planning and digitisation for projects.
summary: Project management consultant with over 16 years of medium to large multi-discipline Mining/Energy/Petrochemical project management experience, with strong Mechanical Engineering, Scheduling, Project Controls, Contract Management, Data management systems/procedures and Integration background.

treasury_media.title: In Pictures: Da Vinci TT100 Awards
treasury_media.description: In Pictures: Da Vinci TT100 Awards. (Photography by: Darryl Linington) The Da Vinci TT100 Business Innovation Awards 2017 took place in JHB

profile_positions.description:
Grant oversees the operations of SSG consulting, which provides project and business consulting, project execution and staffing to the mining, petrochemical, power and other industries.
He also headed up the development of KEY360, the project and business management software platform developed by SSG Consulting, which has been awarded the Accenture Innovation 2016 & 2017 awards as well as  TT100‘s Department of Science and Technology Ministers Award overall excellence award 2017.

•	Project Controls - Responsible and accountable to oversee and guide multiple project controls related services in a portfolio of clients with contracts ranging in size from R100k – R140m, on Capital Engineering projects up to R4.8bn. This includes client and stakeholder management, contract and account management, mentoring and staff development, team management, new business development.

•	Systems implementations, Business Consulting - Responsible and accountable to develop, strategise, implement and project manage multiple engineering construction project management systems and procedures, with multiple clients and implementation teams. Client account size of R1m – R18m, all completed on or under budget and time.
profile_positions.title: Chief Operations Officer at SSG Consulting

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible and accountable to develop, strategise, implement and project manage multiple construction project management systems and procedures, with multiple clients and implementation teams. Client account size of R1m – R15m, all completed on or under budget and time. Various Major accounts were extended for additional systems due to successful and under-budget implementations.
•	Project management consulting to clients on 9 medium to large projects, across Project Controls, Engineering, Quality, Cost Engineering, Procurement, Contract management, Commissioning, Claims and other knowledge areas. Direct clients included De Beers, Exxaro, ASSMANG, Tubular, GLTA, ELB Engineering, and others
•	Specification development, System development management and testing and release management of in-house project management software systems.
•	Coach, mentor and lead personnel within a project management and systems implementation team environment
•	Claims development and forensic planning for claims for major fabricators and SMPP contractors.
•	Internal business development and improvement
•	New business marketing, systems demonstrations and tender development
profile_positions.title: Account Manager, Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Responsible and accountable to coordinate and execute the tendering, clarification, negotiation and adjudication for the major procurement packages for a proposed 200MVA photovoltaic power plant, on behalf of Tozzi Sud Spain.
•	Each of the project packages required Vendor scouting, Issuing of Request for Quotation to market, Scope of work management, Clarification management and Negotiation and alignment of technical offers.
profile_positions.title: Procurement Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Exxaro GMEP project: Project and Engineering readiness Studies, Multiple knowledge area integration, Commissioning plan development, Engineering reviews, Detailed resource loading studies, Development of Detailed Contract management and Engineering roles and responsibility matrices, Project Contract Adjudication Planning and setup, Project Procurement operating plan setup, Vendor Document Planning, Detailed work instructions and procedure development across multiple disciplines of the project, Contract kick off meetings and Design Consultant quality reviews and deliverables measurement, where major roles.
•	Managing ASSMANG’s Iron Ore R&D portfolio. The portfolio consisted of over 70 potential projects with a 3 year budget of R74m. Project prioritization techniques, planning, budgeting, resource allocation, research and project monitoring and implementation where among the performed tasks. This Initiative was cancelled before completion along with others in the small project pipeline.
•	Engineering, planning and Project management roles relating to the Pre-feasibility and Feasibility study for the Khumani iron ore mine’s 10-22Mtpa expansion project, for ASSMANG Iron Ore
profile_positions.title: Project Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Reviewing construction progress and quality assurance. Resolution of risks that may affect the scheduled commissioning dates. Ensuring design information and drawings are distributed to site. Ensuring completeness of “as built” drawings. General engineering input. Facilitating of 3D drawing reviews on site. Sub-contractor management. Commissioning punches and follow-up closeout.
•	Clarifying any commercial queries with contracts. Ensuring contracted requirements are met. Ensuring all maintenance and operational information is correctly developed. Assisting Area Managers in cost control and forecast-to-complete estimates. Representing Kumba in any quality assurance and expediting activities. Site supervision. Commissioning assistance. Setting up of contracts and specifications. Finite element simulation reviews.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Area Engineer- Services and infrastructure, Package Engineer

profile_positions.description: Finite element and other computer simulations using MSC Patran, Nastran, Dytran, Mark, Mentat and ADAMS car and ADAMS tracked vehicle. The types of simulations include structural, dynamic, fluid dynamics and landmine blast/gas-fluid-structure interaction simulations. Design work with the aid of computer aided drawing packages. Delivered a presentation at the MSC yearly conference for leading work in dynamic track simulations.
profile_positions.title: Simulation Analyst and Design Engineer
